alert.note: Alert for City of Norfolk; City of Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:26PM EDT until June 25 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR ...THE SOUTHEASTERN CITY OF NORFOLK AND THE NORTHWESTERN CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH... At 526 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Virginia Wesleyan University, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Virginia Beach around 550 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gallups Corner, Bayside and Princess Anne Plaza. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Norfolk; City of Virginia Beach
